content:
…a second-year PhD student in the Image Data Signal (IDS) department at Télécom Paris under the supervision of Randal Douc, François Roueff and François Portier.
My current research lies in the field of Approximate Inference. In particular, I am interested in Variational Inference methods involving non-conjugate models and alternative divergence measures (such as the $f$-divergence).
Email : kamelia [dot] daudel [at] telecom-paris [dot] fr

title: Kamélia Daudel
Workshop: Probabilistic Methods in Computational Statistics (II)
